existing_features.title: Replace the user-facing brand text label “Caffeine Jobs” with “M Employed” wherever it appears in the frontend, including the Landing page CTA sentence currently reading “Join Caffeine Jobs today and take the next step in your career journey”.
Update the browser tab/page title in frontend/index.html to use the product name “M Employed” (English), instead of the generic “Employer–Employee Connection Website (Job Marketplace)”.

new_feature_requests.summary: Rename/replace site text/label from "Caffeine jobs" to "M Employed"

projectName: Rename “Caffeine Jobs” brand text to “M Employed”
